Esikā，【陰】 esikātthambha，【陽】 在城門前的壯柱。（p84）
esikā：[f.] a strong post before a city gate.

Esikā：A country in Jambudīpa．

Pannakata was a city of Esikā，and in it was born one of the women described in the Caturitthivimāna

（Vv.42； VvA.195）.
esikā：A pillar in front of a city gate
ESIKĀ：[f] --tthambha [m] đồn kiên cố trước cổng đô thị

esikā：ဧသိကာ （ဣ）
လိုချင်ခြင်း။ တံခါးတိုင်။
